Package org.cyclops.evilcraft.core.algorithm

Class OrganicSpread

java.lang.Object
org.cyclops.evilcraft.core.algorithm.OrganicSpread
public class OrganicSpread extends Object
An algorithm that is able to organically spread an object in an area.

      Parameters:

      dimensions - The amount of dimensions in which this spreading should happen.

      spreadable - The spreadable object.
